summary: This is an email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding Jeffrey Epstein's filing of a notice of appeal of his bail determination on July 23, 2019. The correspondence indicates internal communication about the status of Epstein's legal challenge to his detention.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email exchange; has filed a notice of appeal regarding his bail determination in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Epstein files notice of appeal for bail determination
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein filed a notice of appeal challenging the court's bail determination in his criminal case.

locations.name: United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein filed a notice of appeal regarding his bail determination on July 23, 2019.
The communication is internal correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email exchange shows the office was monitoring Epstein's legal filings and actions.
The document references the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office.
